title: Sniper Elite III-Gameworks
description:
Released: June 27, 2014 
Genre: Adventure 
Developer: Rebellion 
Publisher: 505 Games 
Platform: PC 
Publication Type: License [Steam-Rip] 
Language: English / Russian / German / French / Italian / Spanish / Polish / Brazilian / Portuguese 
Tablet: Reloaded

Minimum Recommended 

Operating system: Windows Vista (SP2) / Windows 7 (SP1) / Windows 8 / Windows 8.1 
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Family / AMD 64 X2 5200 + 
Intel core i3 with a frequency of 3.2 GHz / AMD equivalent 
RAM: 2 GB RAM 
HDD: 18 GB 
Video: GeForce 8800 series / ATI Radeon HD 3870 - ATI Radeon HD 6670 / GeForce GT 640

About Game

In Sniper Elite III emphasis is on giving the player freedom of choice. The game shows a large and diverse world, allows you to use different tactics and play styles. The action takes place in an exotic and deadly North Africa during World War II. Special Agent USS Carl Fairbairn penetrate behind enemy lines to using your skills of an experienced sniper to help the Allies fight the formidable German tanks "Tiger" in the Western Desert. 
But the main concern Karl - not the famous Afrika Korps. Soon he learns about the plans to build the Germans Ã‚Â«wunderwaffeÃ‚Â» - wonder weapon capable to crush everything in its path and turn the entire course of the war.

Release Information 

Uploaded on: June 27, 2014 
version: 1.0.0.0 


Installation 

Set # 1 (Normal) 
1. Install the setup.exe 
2. Content folder NoDVD folder in a game 
3. play 

Set # 2 (for license holders) 

Attention! Before installing the client in Steam, the game should already be registered on the account, and the client Steam - closed! 
1 . Install the setup.exe 
2 . Copy the contents of the folder in the Steam folder to your client 
3 . Play

For under. information.
